column1: The Pit Room////The meat was solidly good
column2: but the standout was definitely the beef rib!! Brisket was solid
column3: jalape√±o sausage was fine but I've had better. I loved the pickle bar. BUT the barbecue sauce was vvvv weird - it tasted like tomato sauce mixed with bbq sauce. We actually took our food home to eat with a different sauce. Would order the beef rib and bring my own bbq sauce next time
column4: but honestly will probably go to Pinkerton's instead
